website_summaries.verdict: A well-priced solution from one of the most reputable brands in the automotive industry.
pros: Approved for both gasoline and diesel engines, this synthetic fuel injector cleaner stabilizes ethanol, maximizes horsepower, and improves responsiveness
Utilizes highly-concentrated polyether amine detergents to remove clogs and optimizes injector spray patterns
A great fit for those looking to improve idle smoothness
cons: Fuel economy gains may not be substantial enough to observe, depending on driving style

customer_reviews.title: My Engine Light Went Off!
customer_reviews.text: It made my engine light go off! I don't know if it'll stay off for long but I'll keep using this product. I was told I needed new $1800 fuel injectors. If this product continues to work it'll be one of my best purchases ever. Thanks Royal Purple! Update: Engine light came back on 3 months later
customer_reviews.author: Joy Marie

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Everyone brags about fuel mileage going up with products like this. Well, as it turns out - it's true. 130K Civic went from 33.5mpg to 36.9mpg at 70mph extended highway use. I did have one tank that averaged near 38mpg over 440 miles of driving, but it settled lower to the previously stated number. I will use this in all of my gasoline vehicles in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jed

customer_reviews.title: Worked for us & will continue to use it.
customer_reviews.text: The wifes car seemed to sputter a few times when she was coming to stops and the dealership (same place that wanted $70 to change a $10 cabin air filter that I did in about 3 minutes and required no tools) recommended a fuel injection cleaning for a few hundred $. I decided to run a can of this thru to see if it would help & it took care of the issue with 1 treatment. I treated my truck also & will continue to do a treatment on both vehicles annually.
customer_reviews.author: ct4now

customer_reviews.title: Better than Techron and similar to Jectron
customer_reviews.text: Highway mileage was increased (10% or more) but local looks similar or need more sample driving. Beside, my car (MDX 2008) drives and accelerates more smooth. Shorter than 10 days usage but it looks better than Techron and similar to Liqui Moly Jectron.
customer_reviews.author: Sok-hyong H. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff. Actually got better gas mileage using this ...
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff. Actually got better gas mileage using this stuff. Stop and go driving in the DFW area. Don't know if it was a fluke or not, used the same station and made the same trips. 2014 V-6 Mustang with manual trans got 25.6 mpg. Will be using again soon. Taking the wife's PTCruiser on a trip. Eager to see if it will do the same for the PT.
customer_reviews.author: Olin K. Johnson Jr.

customer_reviews.title: great results!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic results! I've tried alot of different PEA based injector and fuel system cleaners before and this one definitely had some noticeable results. Roughly 95k on my direct injected audi a4 and I always had a misfire on startup even after an intake port cleaning. After using one can of this on roughly 10 gallons of gas, the idle quality improved drastically and the throttle response as well. For the price, I think its worth it to continue using this product every oil change.
customer_reviews.author: Spawne32

customer_reviews.title: More ended up on the floor than in the gas tank
customer_reviews.text: After multiple failed attempts to open the bottle, I striped the safety lock and the cap was just spinning. I then go to tap the cap on the floor and it just breaks open. I lost about half here. The rest I lost while trying to pour the contents into my tank as the bottle has no funnel. You could call this a user error but I did not hit the bottle that hard and the safety lock did not work. I guess I’ll never actually know if this worked or not because the majority of the bottle’s contents ended up on the ground but will not likely buy this ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Mike G.

customer_reviews.title: Needed for GDI engine
customer_reviews.text: This thing cleans your injector nozzles which gets clogged on GDI engines. The Purple Max Cleaner does this and cleans carbon buildup and is more expensive but this thing is cheaper. Your engine will purr when you pour this product in your gas tank. It won't be as smooth when you use up all your treated gas in your tank but you will notice a difference especially if you haven't been using injector cleaners and carbon cleaners on a regular basis.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: RP all the way
customer_reviews.text: I use all RP product so perhaps I am biased but this product really does do the job. Both their injector / fuel system cleaners do a phenomenal job Results you will actually see in improved fuel mileage. I always use before a long highway trip. Just make sure you run that one tank with the additive completely through
customer_reviews.author: Jeff H

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my 14yr old car purring and flying
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my 14yr old car purring and flying. Recommended this item to my entire family and close friends. The Royal Purple line is THE BEST fuel injection cleaning system that I have ever found in over 20yrs.
customer_reviews.author: LPG

customer_reviews.title: Product is only good if it actually gets into your tank
customer_reviews.text: I have a capless ez-fill gas tank and using this was a disaster - despite getting the flapper open the product poured all over the side of my truck. Never had this happen with STP. Also, there should be a pull tab for the seal..
customer_reviews.author: CiscoKid

customer_reviews.title: It works well.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product that seems to actually work. I use it every 3-4 fill ups or so therefore I can’t really comment on its ability to really clean old dirty injectors but it definitely keeps mine clean and I see a definite increase in fuel economy when using this product versus some other injector cleaners I’ve used in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey B. Platt

customer_reviews.title: Royal Purple Fuel Injector Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this to anyone owning a vehicle that they maintain regularly. I bought this for my 2011 Suburban since I haven't ever ran any fuel injector cleaner through it. I notice my Suburban still runs smooth and continues to get good fuel mileage. I would recommend Royal Purple to anyone else.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: A Necessity For Our Post Katrina Fuel
customer_reviews.text: After hurricane Katrina fuel quality requirements were lowered in order to minimize shortages. To provide for good performance and to minimize fuel system issues you need to routinely run fuel injector cleaners and fuel system cleaners. The Royal Purple Injector Cleaner is a safe to use cleaner that performs very well.
customer_reviews.author: Tomas Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Give it a try, it made a difference in my car!
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well! 2014 Kia Forte 127,000 miles was running with some hesitation and some spitting while driving. After dumping the bottle into a full tank of gas 20 or so miles it started to spit even worse. I thought to myself that I made a big mistake trying something new. The next day the car runs like a champ, mileage has improved it runs as smooth as if it was new again. Highly recommended this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2-3 mile per gallon improvement, love it!
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff, improved gas mileage by 2-3 miles per gallon. I'll be using again to keep my vehicle running right. In my case I was chasing a problem that ended up being corrected by replacing the fuel filter, but the result of using this stuff prove to be pretty impressive and worth repeated use.
customer_reviews.author: MyTGuru

customer_reviews.title: Cleans the fuel system
customer_reviews.text: I bought several of these to put in my Jeep for a long weekend trip where I knew I would burn about 6 tanks. Using these got me about 2 extra miles per gallon and made the Jeep run smoother. I will start putting a bottle of this in my Jeep every 9 or 10 tanks. Royal Purple makes the best stuff
customer_reviews.author: TankJeep2015

customer_reviews.title: Very good product !
customer_reviews.text: Very good product, I used it in both of our cars, a Toyota Highlander and a Lexus LS, and it improved the throttle response and idle smoothness on both. I was unsure if I would notice any difference at all and I am very pleased. I plan to use this product ever 3,000 miles from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Brettster3

customer_reviews.title: Arrived leaking in the box
customer_reviews.text: Arrived, opened the box to find that it had had been leaking. Of the 6 ounces, only about 4 were left in the bottle. What a waste of my time and money, not buying this ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I love royal purple products. I’ve been using their oils since they came out. I put this injector cleaner into my q50 and can’t tell any difference but I’m more concerned about preventative maintenance.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Albert

customer_reviews.title: My older car seemed to enjoy some in the tank
customer_reviews.text: My bf’s brother told me to try this after I told him I was gonna buy sea foam. I don’t see a reason not to buy this one in the future. My older car seemed to enjoy some in the tank. I got better gas mileage.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lovell

customer_reviews.title: My car started up
customer_reviews.text: I’ve watched different videos on YouTube, but I must say I used it in my 86 BMW and it cleaned the fuel system. My car started up better and running better. Also put one in my 2011 ford ranger it running better too, I’m going to try their brand of oil next
customer_reviews.author: Bramble

customer_reviews.title: Shipping is terrible. Busts everytime
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure the product works as stated. I havent been able to use it. The first order had a container that had leaked everywhere. I had another one shipped with the same problem. One of these days ill get a good product and be able to try it.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Vukmir

customer_reviews.title: Pea is what it is it works with modern ethanol fuels
customer_reviews.text: About the cheapest bottle of pea you can find, that's what cleans the system I ran 2 in my Honda and will every couple of oil changes just to keep everything clean but I'm talking lines and such not combustion chambers
customer_reviews.author: matt daugh

customer_reviews.title: like a tune up in a can
customer_reviews.text: added this product as instructed. like a tune up in a can!!!! i will use as often as instructed here forward !!! car runs smoother better hp n mph went up!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sal

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about this
customer_reviews.text: I only gave 3 stars because I couldn't see any difference......but in fairness not sure if you really will. I love Royal Purple, I use their oil products in all of my vehicles. Not sure if I will purchase this specific product again but I will continue to buy their oil.
customer_reviews.author: zackery blair

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This additive definitely makes my car run better, I use it at every tankful fillup and will continue to do so. The car has more power and better performance.

customer_reviews.text: I'll be using it often (every 15k or so) on my girlfriends direct injected Focus. Not sure if it will help prevent any direct injection related injector problems but it's worth a shot!

customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using royal purple engine oil for a couple of years now. And their products are top of the line. So this is no exception, but don’t expect to get a new engine when you pour this in the tank.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great, I usually add the RP max clean but ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked great, I usually add the RP max clean but there was a big backlog this time. Restored efficiency of the burn like Max Clean did. Cant beat RP.

customer_reviews.title: Lost car power restored!
customer_reviews.text: You can immediately feel the power being restored to your car as soon as you add this to your fuel fill up. Will be buying it again for my other cars.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't improve fuel efficiency
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2003 Honda Pilot that gets 11mpg in town and 14mpg in the city. I changed all the spark plugs and tried a few different fuel injector cleaners but nothing helped improve the fuel efficiency.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse A. Safir

customer_reviews.title: Good product not for one time use
customer_reviews.text: Works decent dont expect miracles in one use. It should be used for multiple tanks of fuel. I would get 4-5 bottles. A lot of direct injection cars really need some detergents as they can get build up because there is no fuel going through the intake valves to keep them clean. You want it cleaned slowly as freeing up too much might cause issues
customer_reviews.author: Pitty

customer_reviews.title: Bottle was leaking
customer_reviews.text: Seal on the bottle was punctured and the product was leaking on both bottles. Only about half full by the time I got it. I won’t buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge fan of this product. I have used it for years (every 3 mos). My truck is five years old, and I do mostly city driving. I am using it also on a 10 year old car with 120K miles, and it immediately made it run smoother after 3 uses.

customer_reviews.text: This is the stuff you've been looking for to clean your fuel system. I treat my fuel tank to a bottle every 3,000 miles and my car with 150,000 miles runs great.

This was after a thorough TB cleaning and new fuel filter. After adding a full bottle to about 10 gallons I had noticeably better acceleration.

customer_reviews.title: This thing is definitely amazing. I drive a 2008 Honda Civic SI and ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is definitely amazing. I drive a 2008 Honda Civic SI and I average roughly 320 miles to the tank. For those thinking that's such a little bit for a civic it's because it has a higher compression ratio and cranks out 200 horsepower in a 2 liter engine. Normally when cars have mileage that bad, they'll make the gas tank larger to accommodate that lacking in mileage. But I digress, with this atomizer added I was able to get my car up to 350 miles to the tank. I'll definitely buy this again.

product_meta.title: Royal Purple 18000 Max Atomizer Fuel Injector Cleaner - 6 oz.
product_meta.description: Item Package Quantity:1Royal Purple’s Max-Atomizer is a fully-synthetic, highly concentrated, high performance fuel injector cleaner. It is specially formulated to solve problems with today’s direct injection engines, but can be used with any type of fuel injection. Max-Atomizer contains highly concentrated polyether amine (PEA) detergents that quickly clean clogged and coked injectors, restoring 100% of injector flow. This optimizes injector spray patterns and better atomizes fuel as it enters the combustion chamber. The result is improved fuel economy, enhanced power and performance, reduced emissions, smoother idle, and quicker / easier starts. Max-Atomizer is the only fuel injector cleaner that also stabilizes ethanol, which chemically breaks down to cause harmful effects to an engine.
feature_bullets: For use in both gasoline and diesel engines
